document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Tufanbeyli Project in Middle East, Turkey dated July 2011.pdf
document.description: This technical report provides a comprehensive assessment of the Tufanbeyli Zinc Project in Turkey, including geological data, mineral resource estimates, and exploration recommendations.
